data.tweet: See the numbers behind Manchester City's 5-0 thrashing of FC Copenhagen

data.tweet: Manchester City successfully played an incredible 88 passes into the final third, considerably more than the 17 they played in their last game (against Manchester Utd). FC Copenhagen played nine successful passes into the final third.

FC Copenhagen played nine successful balls throughtout the game.
In their last game (against Manchester Utd) Manchester City completed 17 passes into the attacking third.
This season, FC Copenhagen have averaged 25 final third presses per 90 minutes.
Manchester City allowed their opponent to take an average of 11 touches each time they pressed.
